DataElement.preferredName: Eligibility Criteria Agreement No Sperm Donor Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not male patients have agreed to not donate sperm.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Spermatozoon Donor Consent Agreement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._The male reproductive cell that is formed in the testicle. A sperm consists of a head, a body, and a tail that provides propulsion._One that contributes something._Permission to do something._The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A human being.:The male reproductive cell that is formed in the testicle. A sperm consists of a head, a body, and a tail that provides propulsion.

Concepts.definition: The male reproductive cell that is formed in the testicle. A sperm consists of a head, a body, and a tail that provides propulsion.

Property.preferredName: Donor Consent Agreement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: One that contributes something.:Permission to do something.:The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Male patients must agree not
ReferenceDocuments.description: Male patients must agree not to donate sperm for the duration of treatment until 90 days after the last dose of study drug.

DataElement.changeDescription: Created for 1601 study in Rave per request by J.Zhao. mc 1/9/17
